message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $130. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $125?
I'm still a bit short on budget, could you meet me at $122? That's the lowest I can go
